name: Openwave Computing LLC
overview: Openwave specializes in providing various services like Website Design and Development, Mobile Web Application Development, Desktop Application Development, Internet Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Pay Per Advertising and Product Development with an innovative approach to technology and designing methods. Openwave Computing Services is a premier Information Technology leader, providing exemplary services to the clients worldwide since 1997. Our clientele includes the Fortune 50 at one end and SMEs at the other. We, Openwave, transform our relationships from being just a service partner to a strategic partner.

milestones.description:
Mohamed Sathak, President:
As a President, Mohamed Sathak has an overall responsibility of IT services and growth of Openwave Computing. Under his leadership and direction Openwave has experienced growth year over year since 1997.

Aslam Hussain, Managing Director In his position as Managing Director he is responsible for the financial planning and infrastructure expansion for Openwave Computing. He brings with him over 25 years of experience.

B Srinivasan, Executive Vice President In his current role as EVP, Srinivasan is responsible for Organization- wide Strategy Planning, Deployment and Operations Management. His professional background covers 27 years of Management Exp
